about_the_game:
Welcome to Starryard, an adrenaline-packed space flight shooter. In this game, you will play the role of a pilot of a spaceship, maneuvering the spaceship to shuttle between the stars, and at the same time need to defeat the enemy in fierce battles.

Use the mouse to control the direction in the game, the left button can launch a machine gun attack, and the right button can launch a tracking missile for long-range attack. In addition, you can also use the space bar to accelerate, the QE key to rotate, and the WASD key to control the direction of the spaceship.

During the game, you'll encounter a variety of enemies, including other spaceships, space stations, and more.

Start your Starryard journey now, explore the unknown areas of the universe, defeat enemies, and become the overlord of the universe!

name: Starryard

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: win7/8/10/11
  • Processor: I5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
